name: Migni Must Live... - Simple Jam Edition (READ DESC)
name_original: Migni Must Live... - Simple Jam Edition (READ DESC)
description:
*You can play in WebGL, but you have to spam-click the fullscreen button as fast as you can when the game launch to hear the sounds/music.

Migni must survive while Magnem is conquering the world.
Is Migni lucky enough to live another day?
Try to avoid Magnem's traps while he pushes you around and makes you suffer.
This is the first version of Migni, made for the Simple Jam.

Controls:

Move: WASD
Jump: Space
Switch gravity: Do you really think you can control that? You worthless insect!

Credits:

Designer: Jirushi
Programmer: Jirushi
Composer: Jirushi
The guy who drew that cute face and slapped into a boss: Jirushi? Yeah, Jirushi
Modeler: Nah not really Jirushi, magnet model comes from here, and the spikes are basically terrain turned into meshes.
